00016 package pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.impl;
00017 
00018 import java.util.HashMap;
00019 import java.util.Iterator;
00020 import java.util.Map;
00021 
00022 import pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.AnimationSettings;
00023 import pl.mg6.android.maps.extensions.Marker;
00024 import android.os.Handler;
00025 import android.os.Handler.Callback;
00026 import android.os.Message;
00027 import android.os.SystemClock;
00028 import android.view.animation.Interpolator;
00029 
00030 import com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng;
00031 
00032 class MarkerAnimator {
00033 
00034         private Handler handler = new Handler(new Callback() {
00035 
00036                 @Override
00037                 public boolean handleMessage(Message msg) {
00038                         calculatePositions();
00039                         return true;
00040                 }
00041         });
00042 
00043         private Map<DelegatingMarker, AnimationData> queue = new HashMap<DelegatingMarker, AnimationData>();
00044 
00045         private void calculatePositions() {
00046                 long now = SystemClock.uptimeMillis();
00047                 Iterator<DelegatingMarker> iterator = queue.keySet().iterator();
00048                 while (iterator.hasNext()) {
00049                         DelegatingMarker marker = iterator.next();
00050                         AnimationData data = queue.get(marker);
00051                         long time = now - data.start;
00052                         if (time <= 0) {
00053                                 marker.setPositionDuringAnimation(data.from);
00054                         } else if (time >= data.duration) {
00055                                 marker.setPositionDuringAnimation(data.to);
00056                                 if (data.callback != null) {
00057                                         data.callback.onFinish(marker);
00058                                 }
00059                                 iterator.remove();
00060                         } else {
00061                                 float t = ((float) time) / data.duration;
00062                                 t = data.interpolator.getInterpolation(t);
00063                                 double lat = (1.0f - t) * data.from.latitude + t * data.to.latitude;
00064                                 double lng = (1.0f - t) * data.from.longitude + t * data.to.longitude;
00065                                 marker.setPositionDuringAnimation(new LatLng(lat, lng));
00066                         }
00067                 }
00068                 if (queue.size() > 0) {
00069                         handler.sendEmptyMessage(0);
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 
00073         public void animate(DelegatingMarker marker, LatLng from, LatLng to, long start, AnimationSettings settings, Marker.AnimationCallback callback) {
00074                 AnimationData data = new AnimationData();
00075                 data.from = from;
00076                 data.to = to;
00077                 data.start = start;
00078                 data.duration = settings.getDuration();
00079                 data.interpolator = settings.getInterpolator();
00080                 data.callback = callback;
00081                 queue.put(marker, data);
00082                 handler.removeMessages(0);
00083                 handler.sendEmptyMessage(0);
00084         }
00085 
00086         public void cancelAnimation(DelegatingMarker marker, Marker.AnimationCallback.CancelReason reason) {
00087                 AnimationData data = queue.remove(marker);
00088                 if (data != null && data.callback != null) {
00089                         data.callback.onCancel(marker, reason);
00090                 }
00091         }
00092 
00093         private static class AnimationData {
00094 
00095                 private LatLng from;
00096 
00097                 private LatLng to;
00098 
00099                 private long start;
00100 
00101                 private long duration;
00102 
00103                 private Interpolator interpolator;
00104 
00105                 private Marker.AnimationCallback callback;
00106         }
00107 }
